Name: My Little Blacksmith Shop
About the game: My Little Blacksmith Shop is a sandbox blacksmith simulation game where you are tasked with creating weapons for your customers. Mine for ore and refine the ore into ingots. Fashion these ingots into Blades, Blunts, Axes or shield components like hand enarmes, shields bosses, rims and combine them with a variation of grips, guards and shield boards to complete your creations. Level up your character and spend skill points to increase your efficiency. Finally, take a break and visit the local cave or explore the nearby town. Play the game at your pace.
